name: part_012
file: tmp_ASACOCO LIVE NEWS on a Birthday？  #asacoco [SwodJntnYBg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Kiryu Coco is on stage, interacting with the audience before her final performance of the concert.
Kiryu Coco performs the song 'Junrenka' by Shonan no Kaze.

subtitles.original: 近付いてきました。
subtitles.english: We're nearing the end.

subtitles.original: えー、最後に、
subtitles.english: Um, lastly,

subtitles.original: もう1曲だけ、
subtitles.english: just one more song,

subtitles.original: 例のあれ、歌わせてもらってもいいですか？
subtitles.english: may I sing that certain song?

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば億千の星
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, there are billions of stars

subtitles.original: 一番光るお前がいる
subtitles.english: And you are there, shining the brightest

subtitles.original: 初めて一途になれたよ
subtitles.english: For the first time, I could be single-minded

subtitles.original: 夜空へ響け愛のうた
subtitles.english: Echo to the night sky, a love song

subtitles.original: 純恋歌
subtitles.english: Junrenka (Pure Love Song)

subtitles.original: 作詞作曲：湘南乃風
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Shonan no Kaze

subtitles.original: 大親友の彼女の連れ　おいしいパスタ作ったお前
subtitles.english: Your best friend's girlfriend's companion, you made a delicious pasta

subtitles.original: 家庭的な女タイプのおれ一目惚れ
subtitles.english: I fell in love at first sight with the domestic type of woman

subtitles.original: 大貧民負けてマジギレ　それ見て笑って楽しねって
subtitles.english: Getting seriously mad after losing at Tycoon, looking at that, you said 'It's fun, isn't it?'

subtitles.original: 優しい笑顔にまた癒されてベタ惚れ
subtitles.english: Healed again by your gentle smile, I'm head over heels

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて嬉しくて柄にもなくスキップして
subtitles.english: So happy, so happy, I skipped along, quite unlike myself

subtitles.original: 朧げな月を見つめる君に釘付け
subtitles.english: Transfixed by you gazing at the hazy moon

subtitles.original: 守りたい女って思った初めて
subtitles.english: The first time I thought of a woman I wanted to protect

subtitles.original: まじめな顔してギュッと抱きしめた
subtitles.english: With a serious face, I held you tight

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば億千の星
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, there are billions of stars

subtitles.original: 一番光るお前がいる
subtitles.english: And you are there, shining the brightest

subtitles.original: 初めて一途になれたよ
subtitles.english: For the first time, I could be single-minded

subtitles.original: 夜空へ響け愛のうた
subtitles.english: Echo to the night sky, a love song

subtitles.original: これからずっと一緒だお前と俺　最近付き合い悪いと言われるけど
subtitles.english: From now on we'll be together, you and I, even though they say I've been neglectful lately

subtitles.original: なんだかんだ温かく見守ってくれてる優しい連れな
subtitles.english: Somehow or other, you're a kind companion who watches over me warmly

subtitles.original: 変なあだ名で呼ぶなよ　みんな馬鹿ップルだと思んだろう
subtitles.english: Don't call me by a weird nickname, everyone probably thinks we're a stupid couple

subtitles.original: でもいつも落ち込んだ時助けてくれるお前の優しい声
subtitles.english: But it's always your gentle voice that helps me when I'm down

subtitles.original: きっとお似合いな二人　ともに分かり合って重なり合っても
subtitles.english: Surely we're a perfect match, even if we understand each other and overlap

subtitles.original: 折り合いがつかない時は自分勝手怒鳴りまくって
subtitles.english: When things don't go well, I yell selfishly

subtitles.original: パチンコ屋に込み時間潰して気持ち落ち着かせて
subtitles.english: Hiding in a pachinko parlor to kill time and calm down

subtitles.original: 景品の化粧品持って謝りに行こう
subtitles.english: I'll take some prize cosmetics and go apologize

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば大好きな星
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, my favorite star

subtitles.original: あんなに輝いていたのにな
subtitles.english: Even though it was shining like that

subtitles.original: 今では雲が霞めたまま
subtitles.english: Now it's still clouded over

subtitles.original: それがなぜかも分からぬまま
subtitles.english: Without even knowing why

subtitles.original: 会いにゆくよ
subtitles.english: I'm going to see you

subtitles.original: 会いに...
subtitles.english: To see...

subtitles.original: 会いに
subtitles.english: To see

subtitles.original: 会いにゆくよ
subtitles.english: I'm going to see you

subtitles.original: 会いに
subtitles.english: To see

subtitles.original: 桜、並木、照らす、朧月
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms, tree-lined road, illuminating, hazy moon

subtitles.original: 出会ったあの場所へ帰りに寄り道
subtitles.english: Taking a detour to that place where we met on the way back

subtitles.original: 変わらぬ景色変わったのは俺ら二人
subtitles.english: The scenery hasn't changed, what's changed is the two of us

subtitles.original: 見せつけてるつもり目に見えないものなのに
subtitles.english: Intending to show off, even though it's something invisible

subtitles.original: 慣れ合いを求める俺　新鮮さを求めるお前
subtitles.english: Me seeking familiarity, you seeking freshness

subtitles.original: お前は俺のために　なのにおれはおれのため
subtitles.english: You are for me, yet I am for myself

subtitles.original: 春の夜風に打たれ　思い出に殴られ
subtitles.english: Struck by the spring night breeze, beaten by memories

subtitles.original: 気づかされて気づかされた大事なもの握りしめ
subtitles.english: Realizing and having been made to realize, gripping the precious thing

subtitles.original: 今すぐ会いに行くよ　手を繋いで歩こう
subtitles.english: I'm going to see you right now, let's walk hand in hand

subtitles.original: 絶対離さないその手ヨボヨボになっても
subtitles.english: I'll never let go of that hand, even if it gets all wrinkly

subtitles.original: 白髪の数喧嘩しても
subtitles.english: Even if we fight as many times as we have grey hairs
